Name: Absinthe Special Cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Chilled water reduce if wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Tongue-numbingly strong in flavour and alcohol.
Nutrition: One serving of Absinthe Special Cocktail contains 161 calories
